content:

- **Title:** Return of the Jedi
- **Release Date:** May 25, 1983

- **Genres:** Adventure, Action, Science Fiction
- **Homepage:** [Official Star Wars Website](http://www.starwars.com/films/star-wars-episode-vi-return-of-the-jedi)
